_source.short_desc: Our easy-to-use platform provides you with the tools to grow your business. Get iContact Free by visiting iContact.com, link in bio.
_source.long_desc: Unlimited sending. Phone, email, and chat support. iContact Email Marketing helps businesses of all stages and sizes get results. From the small business just getting started, to the professional marketers and agencies, to high-volume senders with 25k-500K+ subscribers, iContact offers a plan to meet every need. All customers get a Success Manager dedicated to getting you up and running quickly, unlimited access to award-winning technical support and a 98% deliverability rating.
_source.pricing_details: Get iContact Free by visiting iContact.com, no credit card required!
_source.target_audience: iContact is perfect for small businesses, entrepreneurs, marketers, agencies, & high-volume sender w/ 25k-500K subscribers. Nonprofits, EDUs, financial services, event mgrs, and many more love us!

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Auto-Responders
category_features.definition: Create and automatically send premade copy in response to customer's messages

category_features.name: CAN SPAM Compliance
category_features.definition: Ensure all of your emails are compliant with anti-spam guidelines

category_features.name: Customer Surveys
category_features.definition: Tool to send questionnaires to customers to gauge feedback

category_features.name: Drip Campaigns
category_features.definition: Create a path to complete a specific goal and guide leads based on the time between actions

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.name: Event Triggered Actions
category_features.definition: Send automated emails based on customer behavior

category_features.name: Image Library
category_features.definition: Store and reuse images in your email body

category_features.name: Landing Pages/Web Forms
category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.name: List Management
category_features.definition: Manage contacts across multiple mailing lists

category_features.name: Mobile Optimized Emails
category_features.definition: Ensure the integrity of your email formatting when viewed on mobile devices

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Subscriber Management
category_features.definition: Add or remove contacts from your mailing list

category_features.name: Template Management
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting for emails, forms, and other campaign elements

category_features.name: WYSIWYG Editor
category_features.definition: "What You See Is What You Get" - see how recipients will see your email formatting while creating the email (no html coding, etc)

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Customizable CTAs
category_features.definition: Create unique call-to-actions to drive clicks (buttons, banners, graphics, etc.)

category_features.definition: Create a path to complete a specific goal and guide leads based on the time between actions

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: ROI Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor conversion rates and analyze effectiveness and profitability of marketing efforts

category_features.definition: Track in detail how users interact with your campaigns and pages (scrolling, button interactions, etc.)

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Email Marketing Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
related_products.features: HubSpot email marketing software makes it easy to start running personalized email marketing campaigns. The intuitive interface makes list and content creation simple, so you're always sending the most relevant information. You can also monitor your email marketing with baked-in analytics, so you can improve your open and click-through rates. Sign up for free, and start running email campaigns that convert and nurture leads, close customers, and contribute to the growth of your business.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Campaigns by Pipedrive is a powerful email marketing tool to help you win prospects' attention with beautiful, customizable layouts.
related_products.features:
Campaigns by Pipedrive is a powerful email marketing tool that helps you win your prospects' attention with beautiful, customizable layouts and then keep it with tracking, analytics and filtering features.

Campaigns is as intuitive as Pipedrive's CRM solution. Simply use its drag-and-drop elements to create your layout or choose one of its conversion-optimized email templates. Then, enter your email and use data in Pipedrive to segment your recipients and start sending.

related_products.short_desc:
Drag. Drop. Done.

Our easy-to-use editor makes it simple to customize and design great-looking emails that stand out on any device.
related_products.features:
Connect with customers and prospects in minutes with so many great features including one-click editing & marketing automation!

We provide you with real-time tracking tools that report who's opening, clicking, and sharing your emails so you can keep growing.

If your next steps include list growth, we can help you grow faster with landing pages, leads from Instagram and Facebook social ads, and even SMS text messaging-- Constant Contact has all of the tools you need in one easy-to-use platform!

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: 130k+ customers use ActiveCampaign for personalized email marketing, giving their contacts exactly what they want, when they want it.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign helps any business connect and engage with their contacts through powerful, easy-to-use email marketing and contact management. Build newsletters, send triggered campaigns, and create personalized messages targeted to each contact's interests so they get exactly what they want, when they want it. The campaign builder and full template library lets you design beautiful emails with just a few clicks, getting the right emails to the right people. Pricing starts at just $9/month.

related_products.short_desc: Get all the email marketing tools you need to grow your business-at an unbeatable price.
related_products.features: Send better emails with Sendinblue's all-in-1 marketing platform. We empower businesses to run smart campaigns and build strong customer relationships. Design beautiful emails with our Drag & Drop editor and 40+ email templates. Run campaigns with A/B testing, advanced segmentation, and automation tools. Sendinblue is trusted by over 300,000 active users worldwide. Try for free and discover what Sendinblue can do for you!

related_products.short_desc:
Improve Your Email Marketing With Keap
Let our software make your email marketing easier and more effective than ever.
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Advanced email marketing tools that are easy to use so you can grow your business using newsletters, websites and more.
related_products.features:
Grow your business with MailerLite's fast and scalable email marketing platform.

Create professional newsletters, landing pages and websites using our drag & drop builders or with pre-designed templates. And manage campaigns on-the-go in the iOS app.

Attract subscribers and nurture relationships with advanced features like pop-ups, multi-trigger automations, embedded surveys, Facebook custom audiences and auto resend campaigns. Measure performance with detailed reporting inside your dashboard.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform for Email Marketing.
related_products.features: Email Marketing 360 - Everyone checks their email. In fact, most of us check our email multiple times per day! Therefore, it's key to have a well thought out email marketing campaign. Email Marketing 360 makes designing and creating email campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific emails are sent to specific people at specific times. No question, email needs to be part of your overall marketing strategy. Get started today.

similar_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
similar_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
similar_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

similar_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing
similar_products.features: Meet Salesforce Email Studio. Reach your customers with the world's #1 email marketing platform. Build smarter email - from basic marketing campaigns to sophisticated 1-to-1 messages. Use drag-and-drop segmentation tools to hone your subscriber list, so your messaging is always relevant. Filter millions of profiles in seconds, and get instant counts for sending. Strengthen your customer relationships with email conversations that drive every stage of the customer lifecycle.

similar_products.short_desc: Get all the email marketing tools you need to grow your business-at an unbeatable price.
similar_products.features: Send better emails with Sendinblue's all-in-1 marketing platform. We empower businesses to run smart campaigns and build strong customer relationships. Design beautiful emails with our Drag & Drop editor and 40+ email templates. Run campaigns with A/B testing, advanced segmentation, and automation tools. Sendinblue is trusted by over 300,000 active users worldwide. Try for free and discover what Sendinblue can do for you!

similar_products.short_desc: Advanced Email reporting and segmentation, list management, template management, AB testing, email automation. Top deliverability.
similar_products.features:
Designed for Media, Publishing and Ecommerce companies, Maropost is a premium Email marketing automation platform that allows you to acquire, engage and convert prospects and customers across multiple marketing channels.

We ensure the best deliverability rates in the market (98%) with a dedicated team to take care of your email marketing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Customer engagement platform for sending automated emails, push notifications, texts, and more to engage and retain your audience.
similar_products.features: Customer.io is the customer engagement platform that enables marketers to build their most sophisticated automated messaging campaigns. With access to your real-time behavioral data, create personalized and relevant messages that engage and retain your customers. Send email, push notifications, text messages, and more all through an intuitive and powerful visual building experience. Built for scale, Customer.io is used by over 4,100 companies, sending over 8 billion messages per year.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-stack Marketing Automation Software. Built for Marketers. Designed for Humans.
similar_products.features:
Create email campaigns from scratch with the drag-and-drop email builder/choose from 150+ templates/upload your own HTML email template file.

Freshmarketer is a full-fledged marketing automation solution for fast-paced marketing teams. It lets you intelligently engage your users across their lifecycle from pre to post-acquisition.

similar_products.short_desc: Omnisend ecommerce email marketing & automation platform that helps you sell more. Compatible with most popular ecommerce platforms.
similar_products.features:
Omnisend is an all-in-one email marketing automation platform built for growth-focused ecommerce brands. Convert visitors into customers, create personalized emails in minutes, and automate your email marketing. Use smart segmentation to create hyper targeted and relevant email messages, earning you more revenue. Omnisend works with all ecommerce platforms including Shopify, Bigcommerce, Magento, WooCommerce and many more.

Join Omnisend Partner program and earn a 20% revenue share.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
similar_products.features: Adobe Marketo Engage does more than just help you create engaging, responsive emails. It intelligently builds and updates customer segments in real time based on their behaviors on other channels, then dynamically sends personalized communications to maximize engagement. Real-time performance metrics allow you to optimize mid-program to increase conversions. Liven up the inbox with impactful email campaigns that are personalized based on your customer's real-time behavior.

similar_products.short_desc: Ortto is a customer data platform, business intelligence tool, and marketing automation all-in-one.
similar_products.features:
With Ortto, you can automate all your emails at exactly the right time. Trigger emails based on time, behavior and interest - like when a website visitor submits a demo request form or abandons your shopping cart without making a purchase.

Ortto helps marketers communicate with their audience, transforming leads into customers and customers into repeat buyers and advocates. Build and manage email lists and design intuitive email campaigns with fully-customizable email templates.

similar_products.short_desc: Act-On email and SMS marketing software helps sales and marketing teams go beyond just email with the power of automation.
similar_products.features:
Make an impact with your audience by sending the right message on the right channel at the right time. With our range of simple-to-build and easy-to-deploy email marketing and SMS messaging solutions, you can design, test, and deploy communications that drive engagement to your target audiences while collecting vital information along the way.

Act-On offers easy to build content templates for email, landing pages, and web forms and provides in-depth reporting for optimization of your campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: An end-to-end email marketing platform for advanced email operations and data-driven growth.
similar_products.features:
Ongage is an email marketing platform for advanced email marketers who are looking to know their customers better and reach their inboxes at scale.

Ongage has the most powerful email API in the market, a built-in SMTP relay, and segmentation, personalization, and campaign optimization capabilities that you have to see.

Give your email operation a new home with Ongage and capitalize on all your previous platform features, while increasing your cost-effectiveness, deliverability, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: An integrated CRM and marketing solution to build campaigns and send emails directly from your CRM. Choose Simple or Advanced solutions
similar_products.features: Our integrated CRM and marketing solution lets you build campaigns and send emails directly from your CRM, using your data to personalize and segment. New leads can be captured from your website and assigned to sales staff to follow up. Or you can add them directly to an automated marketing campaign, letting you work smarter. The stats package means you can monitor the leads, opportunities and value of closed deals, then track the ROI for each campaign, and optimise your marketing spend.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top All-in-One Marketing Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of All-in-One Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: All-in-One Marketing Platforms provide multiple digital marketing tools for SMBs as part of one comprehensive package. Products offer marketing automation, campaign management, email and social marketing, lead management, landing pages/web forms, dynamic content, and various other marketing features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Canned Responses
category_features.definition: Shortcuts for inputting frequently used messages

category_features.name: Data Recovery
category_features.definition: Ability to restore deleted, hidden, or lost data from an email server/system

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Response Management
category_features.definition: Track status and remediate problems in a centralized way

category_features.name: Routing
category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day?s work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.name: Shared Inboxes
category_features.definition: An email inbox that can be accessed and managed by multiple individuals

category_features.name: Signature Management
category_features.definition: Add and maintain centralized email signature(s) across an organization

category_features.name: Spam Blocker
category_features.definition: Ability to prevent junk or spam messages from entering the system?s main inbox

category_features.name: Whitelisting/Blacklisting
category_features.definition: Control system access and/or deliverability for applications and email addresses

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Location Tracking
category_features.definition: Identify an individual's or an asset's location at any given point in time

category_features.name: Team Management
category_features.definition: Organizing a group of people to accomplish a task

category_features.name: Automated Publishing
category_features.definition: Establish rules for automatic propagation of social media posts across one or more channels

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Post Scheduling
category_features.definition: Assign a specific time to when pre-written content appears on social media sites

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

similar_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

similar_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
similar_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.
